I ordered this blouse in the pink with the black pattern and came back again for the gray with the white. I think the fabric drapes beautifully, and the gathered small pleating across the back almost midway down really adds to the fit and the flow. The fabric does not wrinkle easily. I love love the pattern, could be dots could be petals, but its just plain pretty, The button hole are finished well with no loose threads, and the buttons fit through easily but still stay closed. There is no pulling around the bust, and no opening up to peek though between buttons. I can wear it out or tuck it in depending on the look I want. Jeans or leggings, dressed up or casual. The sleeves are long enough to not ride up when I lift my arms and are a little flowy with extra room which is nice. Very pretty, might even buy myself another.
